allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: News Analyzer with Tauri backend and Vue frontend

Features:
- RSS and WeChat Read feed management
- Real-time analysis with LLM integration
- Advanced filtering and selection capabilities
- Database migration to installation directory
- Optimized subscription refreshing with interruption support
- Comprehensive real-time logging system
- System information and settings management

Technical stack:
- Backend: Rust with Tauri framework
- Frontend: Vue 3 with TypeScript
- Database: SQLite with automatic migration
- UI: Responsive design with real-time updates
EOF
)")
Bash(gh repo create news-analyzer --public --description "新闻分析器 - RSS和微信阅读内容分析工具" --clone=false)
Bash(git commit -m "Update formatting and line endings")
Bash(git commit -m "Fix GitHub Actions paths after directory restructure")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Tauri build issues and improve CI configuration

- Remove watcher plugin configuration to resolve dependency issues
- Add proper license and description to Cargo.toml
- Add Rust build target for Windows (x86_64-pc-windows-msvc)
- Add Rust caching for faster builds
- Enable verbose logging for debugging
EOF
)")
